title: Rent a Car
description: A customer wants to rent a mid-size SUV for 3 days from an airport location.

tasks.description: Search for available mid-size SUVs at the specified airport location for the given dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds several mid-size SUVs available.

tasks.description: Present the options and their prices, including any insurance add-ons.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the vehicle options and total costs.

tasks.description: Book the selected vehicle and provide the customer with a reservation number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the car rental booking.
